title: Ann Handley: Spandex & Volkswagen – or How Anyone Can Overcome Their Writing Woes
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: Ann Handley, the world's first chief content officer and best selling author of Everybody Writes, talks about overcoming her own distractions to be a better writer (and why delivering newsletters in her neighbor's mailbox as a child was not scalable.)
itunes:subtitle: Ann Handley, the world's first chief content offi…
description: Ann Handley, the world's first chief content officer and best selling author of Everybody Writes, talks about overcoming her own distractions to be a better writer (and why delivering newsletters in her neighbor's mailbox as a child was not scalable.)
